titleStmt.title: The reasons of Mr. Bays changing his religion considered in a dialogue between Crites, Eugenius, and Mr. Bays.
titleStmt.author: Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.

notesStmt.note: Satire by Thomas Brown on Dryden's conversion. Cf. DNB.

Pts. 2 and 3 were later published as The late converts exposed, or, The reasons of Mr. Bays's changing his religion, and The reasons of Mr. Joseph Hains, the player's conversion & re-conversion. London, 1690.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
